label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Melee creeps average gold bounty reduced by 3
  • Range creeps upgrade cycle gold bounty increased from +3 to +6

descriptionHtml: • Flying movement speed increased from 460 to 470

• Active status resistance increased from 50% to 75%

descriptionHtml: • Percentage damage bonus against non-hero units changed to be a fixed amount matchingQuelling Blade

descriptionHtml: • Bloodpactchanged from 60% of current mana to 30% of max mana
